record.title: ORDERS FOR SATURDAY, JULY 26, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR SATURDAY, JULY 26, 2008 -- (Senate - July 25, 2008)

[Page: S7485]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9 a.m. tomorrow, Saturday, July 26; that following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed to have expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate resume consideration of the motion to concur with respect to H.R. 3221, the Foreclosure Prevention Act, under the provisions of a previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
